scripts.test: npm run jasmine-test && npm run end2end-test
scripts.preend2end-test: docker build -t toolisticon/ssl-hostinfo-prometheus-exporter . && cd test/setup && docker-compose up -d --force-recreate && sleep 60
scripts.end2end-test: pytest test/end2end/test_*.py --junitxml=target/reports/junit.xml && curl -s localhost:9000 | docker exec -i prometheus promtool check metrics
scripts.postend2end-test: cd test/setup && docker-compose stop && docker-compose rm -f -s -v && docker volume prune -f
scripts.changelog:add: git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.release:major: npm run release && npm version major && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:minor: npm run release && npm version minor && npm run version-and-push
scripts.release:patch: npm run release && npm version patch && npm run version-and-push
scripts.version-and-push: npm run changelog && npm run changelog:add && npm run update-env && npm run update-env:add && git push origin && git push origin --tags && git checkout master && git merge develop && git push && git checkout develop
